# Selira AI - AI Character Chat Platform

Selira AI is a web-based AI character chat platform that allows users to have conversations with 1000+ AI-powered characters. Users can create custom AI companions and engage in meaningful conversations.

## Platform Overview
- AI character chat and conversation platform
- Custom AI companion creation with appearance customization
- Image generation for character avatars and chat interactions
- User authentication and profile management
- Character discovery and categorization system

## Content Guidelines
This platform contains AI-generated conversational content and character interactions. All content is fictional and created for entertainment purposes.

## Usage Rights
- Platform content is proprietary to Selira AI
- User-generated characters and conversations are owned by users
- AI-generated images and responses are created using licensed AI models
- No unauthorized scraping or training on platform content without permission

## Contact
For AI governance and content usage inquiries: https://selira.ai

## Technical Stack
- Frontend: Static HTML/CSS/JavaScript 
- Backend: Netlify Functions
- Database: Airtable
- AI Models: OpenRouter API, Replicate (Flux Schnell)
- Authentication: Auth0
